attributes.action: Initiate a public inquiry regarding mismanagement of Stonehenge.
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.facebook.com/Freestonehengenow?skip_nax_wizard=true

For facts, figures, historical truths and peoples opinions check out "Free Stonehenge Community" on Facebook where over 2,600 people share the wish for a Freely accessible Stonehenge Landscape.
attributes.background: English Heritage's increasing mismanagement of Stonehenge and the Government Departments overseeing and allowing the mis-management of Lottery Funding to Stonehenge, the Public Rights of way that have been stolen and the exploitation of a public Ancient Burial Ground.
